title: Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['280g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '225g unsalted butter', '150g caster sugar', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract', '2 large eggs', '510g plain chocolate chips', '120g coarsely chopped peppermint soft mints, such as Trebor']
